content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 114.21 - Effective date

State Regulations
(a) The
provisions of this Part are effective upon filing for publication in the State

Register. (b) Notwithstanding
subdivision (a) of this section, cannabinoid hemp products sold in New York
must meet the requirements set forth in sections
114.9
(a), 114.9
(b), 114.9
(d), 114.9
(f), 114.9
(g), 114.9
(h) and
114.12
(a) by

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
